name: Day and Night (itch)
description:
The game is called Day and Night. It's a basic 2D, kind of point and click game for MacOs, Windows.

I used Corona SDK and Lua to create it. I made everything by myself (design, concept, code). I found sound and additional graphic assets online. 

The game is quite simple but for but it's my first Ludum Dare, I was alone and I made it in around 20 hours so it's not so bad!


Rate it there: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/day-and-night-2d-game-macwindow/
